name: Crane Wing

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Crane Style, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.

sections.text: When fighting defensively with at least one hand free, you gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks. If you using the total defense action instead, you can deflect one melee attack that would normally hit you. An attack so deflected deals no damage and has no other effect (instead treat it as a miss). You do not expend an action when using this feat, but you must be aware of the attack and not flat-footed.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th
description: You move with the speed and finesse of an avian hunter, your sweeping blocks and graceful motions allowing you to def lect melee attacks with ease.
